message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it could significantly enhance your daily activities or professional tasks. I am offering this exceptional item to you for $150. I trust that you will find its value exceeds this price, and I look forward to your consideration.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price? I'd be willing to pay $100 for the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I appreciate your feedback and understanding of the value of our item. While we aim to accommodate all our customers, I must respectfully decline your offer. Our current position remains at $150 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget considerations.
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to meet me halfway? I'd be willing to pay $125 for the product.
